ai-ya2.3.1:1.1_0: He who knows form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ya2.3.1:2.1_0: Or one who understands the aggregates of feeling and perception of form,
ai-ya2.3.1:3.1_0: One who doesn’t understand the mass of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ya2.3.1:4.1_0: One who doesn’t understand the mass of feeling,
